Dragon Lance (Divine Dragonborn Paladin of Bahamut)
By Deborah “Tyr” Templar

This build was originally published in the ECB II on November 13, 2007, and revised for NWN1. The build is a “Divine Dragon”, an epic Paladin/RDD with high/PG AB and damage output bolstered not only by Paladin Spells but also Divine Might and Divine Shield—Sorcerer Variant (option for Great Smiting included). If you prefer a little Song (more of a hum really), see: the Dragon Knight (Bard Variant) which includes a great story about the Dragonborn Knights (Paladins) of Bahamut here: dragon-knight-divine-dragon-pal26-rdd10-bard4-t2294234.html

Without any further ado, please meet:
